page.title: 13A Policeman's Day
page.content: The local policeman's beat covers a vast area where as 100 years ago over 30 men did the same job.Therefor he spends a great deal of time in his car travelling around the area.The day can start at any time and there are no true days off for a country policeman. He lives at the police house in Milborne Port and feels that a vital part of his job is the public relations work he has to do.He visits local school to talk about crime,road safety and the policeman's work.He recently organised a visit to the local schools by the Yeovil Task Force. Crimes in the area vary from assault to poaching and there are a number of traffic control problems on the A30 particularly during the holiday season.
